comments: Turner (IND) briefly rests his arm on Gobert's (MIN) side and the contact as Gobert moves to set the pick is marginal.
Gobert (MIN) makes a play on the ball when he brings his arm down and illegal contact occurs with Haliburton's (IND) head, affecting his driving shot attempt at the basket.
Gobert (MIN) establishes himself in Nembhard's (IND) path and does not deliver illegal contact when setting the pick.
Turner (IND) gathers the ball in the air and takes more than two steps before releasing his shot attempt.
Gobert (MIN) jumps vertically and absorbs the marginal contact as Turner (IND) steps toward the basket and elevates into Gobert during the shot attempt near the basket.
Nesmith (IND) brings his hand to the ball and his hand slides off the ball and brushes McDaniels' (MIN) side prior to the release of the pass. The contact on the play is marginal.
Edwards (MIN) places his off-arm against Nesmith's (IND) side and when he stops, Nesmith's momentum continues to carry him forwards.

Nembhard's (IND) arms come out slightly as he establishes himself in Gobert's (MIN) path and Nembhard collapses his arms against his body and absorbs the marginal contact as Gobert moves into the screen.
Siakam's (IND) forearm brushes Edwards' (MIN) side and the contact during the driving floater attempt is marginal.
Anderson (MIN) closes out into Nesmith's (IND) space and body contact occurs after the release, which affects Nesmith's ability to return to the ground normally.
Nesmith's (IND) hand brushes Conley's (MIN) upper back as the two players disengage during the inbound and the contact is marginal.
Conley (MIN) rests his forearm on Nesmith's (IND) side and marginal contact occurs as he releases away from the defender during the inbound.

Nesmith (IND) grasps and immediately releases Conley's (MIN) jersey during the drive and the contact prior to the pass is marginal. Conley releases his pass and both Nesmith and Conley go the ground on their own accord.
Siakam (IND) commits a take foul on Edwards (MIN). The transition take foul rule does not apply to the last two minutes of either the fourth quarter or overtime.
Gobert (MIN) briefly brings his hand around Turner's (IND) right arm and marginal contact occurs as Turner secures the rebound.
Nesmith (IND) brings his arms to Gobert's (MIN) side and marginal contact occurs as the two players engage during the rebounding opportunity.

McDaniels (MIN) jumps towards Nesmith (IND) and collapses his arm against his side as he closes the distance and jumps to contest.  Just after Nesmith releases the layup attempt, there is marginal lower body contact during McDaniels' contest and after the shot is blocked by Edwards, all further contact is incidental.
Edwards (MIN) cleanly blocks Nesmith's (IND) layup attempt prior to it  reaching its apex or coming into contact with the backboard.
Conley (MIN) steps across Nesmith's (IND) path and his forearm lightly brushes Nesmith's side after his gather. The contact during the layup attempt is marginal.
Edwards (MIN) avoids making illegal contact with Nesmith (IND) during his contest of the layup attempt and incidental body contact occurs as both players return to the floor.
Turner (IND) brings his hands forward and marginal brush contact occurs with Conley (MIN) as he releases his pass.
